name: Railway to the Moon
description:
Deliver boxes to their destinations along neon rails on a warehouse puzzle journey. with 20+ puzzles. Made for VimJam 2, with the theme "On the edge", and requirement "Boss". Note: the game may run slowly on less powerful computers, and may take a long time to load on startup.

Credits:
Patrick - Design, programming
maaaaxaxa - Design, programming
Fizziberry - Art
jotson - VFX, UI
TorchFire - Music
